full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, BTZAN MDOS GTONG TSUL DREGS PA MIG BSGYUR GYI LTAD MO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(BTZAN MDOS GTONG TSUL DREGS PA MIG BSGYUR GYI LTAD MO ZHES BYA BA 'D YANG DUR PED NAS DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA NANG SO SKAL BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS AU TSUGS MTHAR SKYIL GYIS BSKUL BA'I GA-YAR NGO MA BZLOG PAR, LHA 'DRE STONG GI DRA BA LAS 'BYUNG BA DANG SGO BSTUN TE KU S'A LI ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS NOR SKYONG RAB BRGAL TSUL DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI GU SHRI NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL GYIS BA RIS MED YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
